title: monixdotstore
author: monixdotstore
content: Sorted from oldest to newest. Anything missing? Planning to keep it regularly updated here: list of all crypto hardware wallets.Company    Founded    Country of Origin    Products    Coinkite2011CanadaCOLDCARD, OPENDIME, BLOCKCLOCK, TAPSIGNER, SATSCHIPTrezor2013Czech RepublicTrezor One, Trezor Model T, Trezor Suite, Trezor Safe 3Blockstream2014CanadaBlockstream JadeCoolWallet2014TaiwanCoolWallet S, CoolWallet ProKeepKey2014United StatesKeepKey Hardware WalletLedger2014FranceLedger Nano S, Ledger Nano X, Ledger Nano S Plus, Ledger Stax, Ledger LiveSatochip2014BelgiumSatochip Hardware WalletBitBox2015SwitzerlandBitBox02, BitBox02 Bitcoin-only edition, Steelwallet, BitBoxAppBitlox2015Hong KongBitLox Advanced, BitLox Ultimate, BitLox Extreme Privacy SetD'CENT2017South KoreaD'CENT Biometric Wallet, D'CENT Card WalletGridplus2017United StatesLattice1, SafeCardsKeevo2017United StatesKeevo Model 1 Crypto WalletKeystone2017ChinaKeystone Essential, Keystone Pro, Keystone UltimateTangem2017SwitzerlandTangem WalletBC Vault2018SloveniaBC Vault One Crypto Hardware WalletBitfi2018United StatesBitfi, Bitfi 2ELLIPAL2018Hong KongELLIPAL Titan 2.0, ELLIPAL Titan Mini, ELLIPAL JoyNGRAVE2018BelgiumNGRAVE ZEROSafePal2018ChinaSafePal S1, SafePal S1 Pro, SafePal X1, SafePal App, SafePal Extension, Cypher Seed BoardSecuX2018TaiwanSecuX V20, SecuX W20, SecuX W10Ballet2019United StatesBallet REAL Series Cold Storage, Ballet Crypto AppCypherock2019IndiaCypherock X1Foundation2020United StatesPassport, EnvoyOneKey2020Hong KongOneKey Touch, OneKey Classic, OneKey MiniArculus2021United StatesArculus Cold Storage WalletBitkey2023United StatesBitkeyHito2023GermanyHito Hardware Wallet

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: monixdotstore on December 13, 2023, 04:00:26 PMSorted from oldest to newest. Anything missing? Off the top of my head, I'd say Prokey and Klever but I'm pretty sure there's more...Quote from: monixdotstore on December 13, 2023, 04:00:26 PMPlanning to keep it regularly updated here: list of all crypto hardware wallets.I don't want to discourage you by any means, but it's worth noting that in the same sub-board, @maxirosson is already promoting an alternative website that lists almost everything in a very detailed manner, so there's a high chance you'd not be getting a lot of visitors [unless you significantly improve your offerings].BTW, I spotted multiple errors on the last two [you might want to double-check other stuff as well]:BitKey in place of Block.Both of the years they've been founded are wrong.
